methods.name: getDefaultAttributeModifiers
javadoc: Gets a map of item attribute modifiers, used by ItemSword to increase hit damage.

methods.name: getEnchantmentValue
javadoc: Return the enchantability factor of the item, most of the time is based on material.

methods.name: getSlot
javadoc: Gets the equipment slot of this armor piece (formerly known as armor type)

methods.name: isValidRepairItem
javadoc: Return whether this item is repairable in an anvil.

methods.name: use
javadoc: Called to trigger the item's "innate" right click behavior. To handle when this item is used on a Block, see {@link #onItemUse}.
